short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool will help you to view the queue of the issues asigned to you! Also, it will notify you when you recive a new issue.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
****NOTICE*****

This extension has been developed to work on a specifically team and probably will no work on any other situation. So please, do not put bad comments or a bad rate just if it don't work for you. It's not for everyone.
